original_title: Travis Decker search: New evidence shows he is the only suspect in his daughters’ killings, sheriff’s office says | CNN
article_summary: "Travis Decker, a Washington state man, is the sole suspect in the deaths of his three daughters, aged 5 to 9, whose bodies were found with plastic bags over their heads near a campsite in the Cascades. DNA evidence found at the scene matches Decker's profile, and an ongoing manhunt is underway for his arrest, with a $20,000 reward offered for information leading to his capture."</s>
